means: 踏脚石，达到目的的手段

sentence.Network_cn: 每年都在前进一个台阶.

sentence.Network_en: Each of our trouble is a steppingstone.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一个困难都是你的脚踏石.

sentence.Network_en: Each of our troubles is a steppingstone.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一个困难都是你的踏脚石.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 4.2生态节点建设生态节点又称踏脚石(steppingstone)，是整个区域生态体系或者景观格局中，一些面积较小但至关重要的区域。这些 …
...作，而是约翰·霍斯金（JohnHoskyns）的《垫脚石》（SteppingStones），这是一本论述如何与工会打交道和创建自由劳工市场的 …
文化石,马赛克,天然文化石,马赛克腰线,蘑菇石... ... 鹅卵石 Cobblestone 脚踏石 Steppingstone 蘑菇石 Mushroom Rock.
stepping 阶段测法, steppingstone 敲门砖, stepping 颠动

auth_sentence.content: He played all those sessions as a steppingstone to where he wound up.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He played all those sessions as a steppingstone to where he wound up.

auth_sentence.content: The present stage of physical theory is merely a steppingstone toward the better stages we shall have in the future.
